correction.p: OCR generated transcript has not been corrected.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

body.ab:
Mrs. Harry Disosway
requests the honour of your presence
at the marriage of her daughter
Linda Marilyn
to
Mr. Barry Rexford Mosher
on Saturday, the twenty⹀seventh of June
Nineteen hundred and fifty⹀nine
at two⹀thirty o’clock
The Church of the Transfiguration
Manhattan, New York
Reception
following the ceremony
at the home of the bride
695 East 19th Street
Brooklyn, New York
Up Date Addresses B. Mosher 2/14/00
37–51 same
51–55 ” add Thompson Hall 4th Floor
for Manlius School
55–56 ”
9/56–6/57 RPI add 96 Oakwood Ave Troy NY
57–59 ”
Summer of 58 6 weeks at Ft. Bragg NC.
” ” 57 9 Madison St Earlville
(rented house)
58 taxes—W‐2
show both
N. Main St
Earlville (rental)
&
5 W Kendrick Ave
Hamilton
7/1/59–8/10/59 111 Hall St Assign’d to: (rank 2nd Lt.)
Co D, 2nd Battle Group
60th Infantry Ft. Devens Mass
8/10/59–9/4/59 ” Assign’d to:
M.P. Detachment (61‒1170‒2)
Ft Devens Mass (rank 2n Lt)
9/4/59–10/20/59 Augusta GA Assignd to
HQ, PMOC*, USA
Ft. Gordon GA
Reported in on Sept 8
*Provost Marshal Officers Corps
Nov‐59–estimate Feb ’60 195 Florence St Assignd back to
Leominster Mass Ft Devens M.P. Det.
Promoted to 1st Lt Jan 61
Feb 60–Jun 61 Ayer Rd Still at M.P. Detachment
Harvard Mass
Jul 61–estimate Oct 61 #17 Green St Claymont
Brookview Apts
est Oct 61–64 4855 E. Willock Rd
est 64–spring 66 8235 N Essen
est spring 66–fall 66 Dublin Rd rent
est fall 66–Aug 67 Cardinal Dr You turned 1 yr old here Pulaski
est Aug 67–Dec 69 100 Cambridge
69–71 1303 Foulk
71–75 2210 Garfield Ave Roomd Dot’s
74–75 Apt 202 1301 N Harrison St Dorsett Apts
Wilm. DE
mailing address still 2210 Garfield
Aug 75–Feb 81 1324 Riverside Dr
Mar 81–present 4 VanSant Closed on house 3/2/81
Quit Sun Olin in ’84
1967 Austin Healey 3000 VIN HBJ8L 36775
[A transcription of this page is not available.]
